participant_1.background:
I once spent a weekend in a cabin in the woods, cooking my own food and reading books by the fire.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
I'll be making a batch of organic cat food for my kitty.
I don't play sports because I'm too busy going to brunch with my family.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.

participant_2.background:
I started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others.
I have a family who loves to celebrate Halloween.
i think dogs could learn to read if they were trained well.
i work as a barista.
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love to read romance novels and write blog posts about them!
Oh that sounds fun! I love to read too. What is your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd have to say "The Notebook" by Nicholas Sparks.
I love that book too! It's so romantic. I've read it multiple times.
Me too! I've read it at least four times.
What are you reading right now?
I'm currently reading "The Hating Game" by Sally Thorne.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to brunch with my family, read romance novels, and write blog posts.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! I love brunch too.
Me too! It's the best way to start the day.
What kind of blog do you write?
I write a blog about my love of romance novels.
That sounds really interesting. I'd love to read it sometime.
Sure! I'll send you the link.
Great! Thanks!
You're welcome
